content: skill level intermediate level 3 jiffy® article #450 3 colors 1 ball each crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm six star-shaped yellow plastic buttons for each stocking sewing needle and thread gauge 10 sts = 3 inches 7 5 cm in single_crochet u s work stocking flat and sew seams crochet tree and trunk sew onto stocking to finish
